acknowledgementDocumentType.title: Acknowledgement_ Document. Details

isOrHasMultipleReferences.title: Acknowledgement_ Document. Multiple References. Indicator
isOrHasMultipleReferences.description: The indication of whether or not this acknowledgement document has multiple references.

id.title: Acknowledgement_ Document. Identification. Identifier

typeCode.title: Acknowledgement_ Document. Type. Code
typeCode.description: A code specifying a type of acknowledgement document.

name.title: Acknowledgement_ Document. Name. Text
